definition: a level area for holding sports events, surrounded by seats for spectators
example: The arena was full of excited spectators cheering on their team.

definition: engaging or engaged in without payment; nonprofessional.
example: it takes five years for a top amateur to become a real Tour de France rider

definition: a person who is proficient in sports and other forms of physical exercise.
example: he had the broad-shouldered build of a natural athlete

definition: the sport of competing in track and field events, including running races and various competitions in jumping and throwing.
example: There are some very good runners on our athletics team

definition: to give someone something as a reward for high achievement
example: All the members of the winning team were awarded a gold medal.

definition: to defeat someone in a game or a competition
example: Italy beat France to win the 2006 FIFA World Cup.
